titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and Court of Aldermen at St. Bridget's Church, on Easter-Monday, 1696 by ... Symon, Lord Bishop of Ely.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

notesStmt.note: Half title: The Bishop of Ely's sermon Easter-Monday, 1696.
